extension.name: System - Zen Shortcodes
extension.author: Joomla Bamboo
extension.description: Zen Shortcodes is a plugin built for Zen Grid Framework v4 compatible themes. Use it to render icons, layouts within content and buttons compatible with your template.

field.description: This setting determines the icons to be used in the shortcode syntax.
field.label: Font Awesome
field.name: icon_select

field.description: Enter a comma separated list of any custom icons you wish to display using the shortcodes syntax. The names enter below will be available using the following syntax {zen-yourcustomname}content{/zen-yourcustomname}. Items added here will be rendered within span classes using the following classes zen-icon zen-iconyourcustomname.
field.label: Custom Icons
field.name: custom_icons

field.description: Enter a comma separated list of any custom syntax you wish to display using the shortcodes syntax. The items will be rendered according to the name entered here. eg {zen-customname}Your content{/zen-customname}. The resulting content will be output in a span class using the customname entered.
field.label: Custom Syntax
field.name: custom_syntax
